title: Klarion, Volume 1: The New Witch in Town
description: Writer Ann Nocenti introduces Jack Kirby's classic character Klarion The Witch Boy to a whole new generation.Klarion moves to Gotham City to master his magical skills. On his way to mastering his skills, Klarion encounters other young witches and wizards with deep secrets like himself. Together, these teenagers work to not only master magic, but to deal with the everyday issues of being a teenager in the chaotic climate of Gotham.Collects: Klarion #1-6.
author: Ann Nocenti
